results.title: Compliance, self control and prosocial behavior
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Human development: enhancing social and cognitive growth in children.”.
The socialisation process is important if children are to be raised into healthy adults. Skills and traits children must learn are co-operation, sharing, empathy, self-control, the delay of gratification and empathy which can be enhanced through play. Styles of parenting are discussed together with the technique of modeling to develop positive behaviour and the effect of self-fulfilling prophecies.

results.title: Compilation: one hundred entertainments
results.brief_description: One hundred entertainments: Follows an acrobatic troupe in Shensi Province as they perform and talk about their lives. “Son of the ocean”: A film crew travels on a boat on the Yangtze and talks to some of the passengers.

results.title: Compilation: not so much a desert more a way of life
results.brief_description: Not so much a desert more a way of life: Much of Australia is described as desert, but wherever he looks, David Bellamy finds life among the sand and rocks. “The Great barriers” (prod. Mike Weatherley): Australia’s coasts are battleground’s where seaweeds, coral and mangroves fight for survival against the ravages of the ocean.

results.title: Compilation: il bruco the apple worm
results.brief_description: Three animated films by Bruno Bozzetto. “The Apple worm”: A humorous look at the troubles of an apple worm. “The Swimming pool”: A man who looks forward to using his new swimming pool is thwarted at every turn. “Self service”: A satirical cartoon about a group of enterprising mosquitoes.

results.title: Competitive swimming: starts, turns, stroke drills
results.brief_description: Demonstrates the correct form for all swimming starts - grab start for freestyle, breaststroke and butterfly; correct entry for freestyle, butterfly and breaststroke; relay starts and the backstroke start for both long and short courses. Illustrates all turns, using slow motion and underwater camera, and also shows progressive drills for all strokes.

results.title: Competitive diving : Basic diving skills
